entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
